name: Sembly AI
description: Sembly AI is an AI notetaker designed for teams and professionals, offering features like transcription, meeting summaries, and actionable insights for various meeting types.
longDescription: Sembly AI is an AI-powered notetaker that automates meeting transcription, summarization, and insight generation for professionals and teams. Its mission is to enhance productivity by minimizing routine note-taking tasks, improving collaboration, and providing actionable deliverables from meetings. It serves users by capturing discussions from platforms like Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, and Zoom, and supports offline conversations and multi-format uploads. The tool supports over 45 languages, ensures enterprise-grade security, and integrates with CRMs, project management, and productivity apps to streamline workflows.
features: Captures and transcribes meetings from Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Cisco Webex, and Zoom, turning them into searchable records.
Supports uploading recordings in formats like MP3, MP4, WAV, AIFF, AAC, OGG Vorbis, FLAC, or ASF, with up to 5 hours duration and 500 MB per attachment.
Provides real-time, automated transcription in over 45 languages, identifying speakers and handling background noise.
Generates meeting notes with highlights, key insights, action items, and future projections to enhance team workflows.
Integrates with CRMs, collaboration, project, and task management software, and productivity apps for seamless connectivity.
Offers AI meeting assistant features like answering questions, automating deliverables, and creating custom follow-ups or sales pitches.
Includes conversation search for easy retrieval of meeting details.
Provides templates and collections for organizing discussions.
Allows sharing of meeting notes and insights with team members.
Features data retention control to specify how long meetings are stored before automatic deletion.
Offers workspace analytics to overview total meetings, conversation hours, and average active attendees.
Generates actionable insights, multi-meeting chats, and AI artifacts for enhanced collaboration.
Supports project management by automating plans, schedules, and task tracking directly from meetings.

faqs.question: Why should my company choose Sembly Notes?
faqs.answer: Sembly AI notes generator is designed for professionals seeking advanced AI features, automatically joining calls, recording, transcribing, and delivering actionable insights, minimizing routine work, improving productivity, and ensuring enterprise-grade security.

faqs.question: How can Sembly Meeting AI improve my workflows?
faqs.answer: Sembly Notes assists with transcription, meeting notes, action item extraction, and AI chat, grouping discussions, sharing notes, and syncing details via integrations to reduce manual efforts.

faqs.question: Is Sembly Notes secure and compliant with regulations?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is SOC 2 and EU-US DPF certified, fully GDPR-compliant, and adheres to HIPAA, PCI DSS, FERPA, and Microsoft 365 requirements, ensuring safe AI note-taking.

faqs.question: Which languages does Sembly Notes support?
faqs.answer: Sembly supports 48 languages, including English, French, Spanish, German, Japanese, Arabic, and more, enhancing global collaboration.

faqs.question: What currencies does Sembly Notes accept?
faqs.answer: It accepts currencies like USD, GBP, INR, CAD, AUD, EUR, and others, including DR, PHP, COP, BRL, MXN, SGD, ZAR, AED, CHF, PKR, ARS, TRY, SEK, CLP, MYR, NZD, NOK, ILS, and SAR.

faqs.question: Which conference apps can I use with Sembly Notes?
faqs.answer: Sembly works with Google Meet, Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Cisco Webex, and supports other apps via device audio recording or file upload in supported formats.

faqs.question: How does Sembly handle privacy and security for enterprise customers?
faqs.answer: It does not use audio, video, or text data from Enterprise Plan customers for model training, offers opt-out settings for other plans, and uses PII only for service features, never sharing content outside specified subprocessors.

faqs.question: Can Sembly generate tasks from meetings?
faqs.answer: Yes, it creates actionable tasks with assignees, due dates, and context through AI Tasks Chat for improved team workflows.

faqs.question: Does Sembly support offline team conversations?
faqs.answer: Yes, it supports offline team conversations, capturing and analyzing them for insights and notes.
